mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ecny.ecny_sign_signinfo (PAYDATE, PAYSERNO, PAYTIME, SIGNNO, SIGNSTATUS, ACCTPTYID, ACCTTYPE, ACCTID, ACCTNAME, IDTYPE, IDNO, TELEPHONE, WALLETPTYID, WALLETID, WALLETTYPE, WALLETLEVEL, LASTUPJRNNO, LASTUPDATE, LASTUPTIME ) VALUES( #{payDate}, #{paySerNo}, #{payTime}, #{signNo}, #{signStatus}, #{acctPtyId}, #{acctType}, #{acctId}, #{acctName}, #{idType}, #{idNo}, #{telephone}, #{walletPtyId}, #{walletId}, #{walletType}, #{walletLevel}, #{lastUpJrnNo}, #{lastUpDate}, #{lastUpTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT PAYDATE payDate, PAYSERNO paySerNo, PAYTIME payTime, SIGNNO signNo, SIGNSTATUS signStatus, ACCTPTYID acctPtyId, ACCTTYPE acctType, ACCTID acctId, ACCTNAME acctName, IDTYPE idType, IDNO idNo, TELEPHONE telephone, WALLETPTYID walletPtyId, WALLETID walletId, WALLETTYPE walletType, WALLETLEVEL walletLevel, LASTUPJRNNO lastUpJrnNo, LASTUPDATE lastUpDate, LASTUPTIME lastUpTime FROM ECNY.ECNY_SIGN_SIGNINFO WHERE SIGNNO = #{signNo}

SELECT PAYDATE payDate, PAYSERNO paySerNo, PAYTIME payTime, SIGNNO signNo, SIGNSTATUS signStatus, ACCTPTYID acctPtyId, ACCTTYPE acctType, ACCTID acctId, ACCTNAME acctName, IDTYPE idType, IDNO idNo, TELEPHONE telephone, WALLETPTYID walletPtyId, WALLETID walletId, WALLETTYPE walletType, WALLETLEVEL walletLevel, LASTUPJRNNO lastUpJrnNo, LASTUPDATE lastUpDate, LASTUPTIME lastUpTime FROM ECNY.ECNY_SIGN_SIGNINFO WHERE WALLETID = #{walletId} AND ACCTID = #{acctId}
